Description:
Job Summary:Provide professional nursing care for outpatients receiving treatments, examinations in the outpatient clinic following established standards and practicesResponsibilitiesAssure quality care by adhering to standards set by the physicians.
Provide care education to patients in person or over the phone.
Adhere to compliance guidelines throughout processes (OSHA, FDA, HIPAA).Skills
Skills:
Graduated from an accredited school of nursing.
Must be a Registered Professional Nurse with current license

Preferred.Residence Location: Egypt; India; Philippines; Saudi Arabia; Tunisia
